/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban environment. The buildings that flank the street are predominantly gray and white, their neutral tones blending harmoniously with the natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
